text:
SAMPLE ORDER FORM
True Phone Card Offer
P.O. Box 7227
Portsmouth, NH 03802-7227
Dear Valued Consumer:

‘Thank you for participating in the True Phone Card Offer. To receive your True pre-paid phone card,
please’ supply us with the information requested below.

Please check one:

T've enclosed 10 proofs-of-purchase for a 10 minute pre-paid phone card

 

T’ve enclosed 20 proofs-of-purchase for a 20 minute pre-paid phone card

Name,

 

 

Address,
$e

City/State/Zip

 

Daytime Phone,

 

Regular Brand Smoked,

 

By participating in this offer, and signing below, I certify that I am a cigarette smoker 21 years of age or
older. I am also willing to receive free samples of cigarettes and incentive items in the mail, subject to
applicable state and federal law.

 

 

Signature
Required
Date of Birth
Required
Mail to: ‘True Phone Card Offer

P.O. Box 7247
Portsmouth, NH 03802

90LL9zE6

Please allow 6 - 8 weeks for delivery.

summary: The True Phone Card Offer is available in New Hampshire. To receive your True pre-paid phone card, supply us with the information requested below. By participating in this offer, and signing below, I certify that I am a cigarette smoker 21 years of age or older. Please allow 6 - 8 weeks for delivery.
